concept.title: Data Visibility in Other SiteCatalyst Versions
concept.shortdesc: After you migrate to version 15, you can continue to view new and historical data in other versions.

conbody.p: SiteCatalyst 13, 14, and 15 all report the same data, as illustrated in the following figure:
To view segments and breakdowns, you must use the version 15 interface. Segments are available on data collected after your migration date.
